name: Deep Research
summary: Performs iterative web research with source-backed synthesis.
longDescription: Plans a research strategy, executes multi-pass browsing, and returns structured findings with citations and confidence notes.

name: Ultracite
summary: Automates citation formatting and reference management.
longDescription: Generates properly linked citations while preserving source traceability for reports, specs, and long-form writing.

name: Playwright
summary: Runs browser automation and interaction testing workflows.
longDescription: Executes scripted browser sessions for QA, scraping, and repeatable UI checks with deterministic step control.

name: Screenshot
summary: Captures page screenshots from local or remote URLs.
longDescription: Creates reliable visual captures for reviews, regressions, and documentation from either local dev servers or published pages.

name: Context7
summary: Injects up-to-date docs and API context into prompts.
longDescription: Resolves fresh framework and package references and supplies relevant snippets to improve code generation quality.

name: Superdesign
summary: Generates UI concepts from prompts and screenshots.
longDescription: Produces component-level design directions and layout variants for product iteration and rapid prototyping.

name: Copy as Markdown
summary: Converts web pages into clean markdown output.
longDescription: Extracts readable markdown from complex pages while preserving headings, links, and content structure.

name: Think
summary: Enforces deliberate step-by-step reasoning.
longDescription: Adds structured thinking checkpoints for better decomposition, edge-case handling, and final-answer quality.

name: Redirect Follow
summary: Resolves redirect chains and final destination URLs.
longDescription: Tracks HTTP redirects and reports final endpoints with status and metadata useful for integrations and audits.

name: Multi Fetch
summary: Fetches and summarizes multiple URLs in a single pass.
longDescription: Parallel-fetches multiple sources and returns normalized summaries for decision support and rapid monitoring.

name: DeepWiki
summary: Provides repo-aware technical context from DeepWiki.
longDescription: Pulls architecture and codebase intelligence from DeepWiki-style sources to improve implementation answers.

name: Sequential Thinking
summary: Breaks complex tasks into deterministic reasoning steps.
longDescription: Imposes a sequential chain for task solving so outcomes are auditable and easier to review.

name: Run in Terminal
summary: Executes shell commands with controlled context.
longDescription: Runs terminal workflows and reports outputs for automation tasks, diagnostics, and local tool orchestration.

name: Semgrep
summary: Scans code for vulnerabilities and policy violations.
longDescription: Runs Semgrep rule packs and returns prioritized findings for secure development and remediation workflows.

name: Hapi UI Enhancer
summary: Enhances UI quality and consistency patterns.
longDescription: Applies modern UI refinements, spacing rules, and micro-layout improvements for production-grade interfaces.

name: Browser Tools
summary: Provides browser inspection and interaction toolchain.
longDescription: Uses browser-level hooks for inspection, interaction, and data extraction in debugging and automation scenarios.

name: Serena
summary: Coding-agent toolkit for structured software delivery.
longDescription: Supports coding workflows with planning, implementation discipline, and reusable engineering patterns.

name: IDE
summary: General coding assistance across IDE-centered tasks.
longDescription: Improves coding productivity with structured edit workflows, context collection, and implementation guidance.

name: Chrome DevTools
summary: Uses Chrome DevTools protocol for browser debugging.
longDescription: Automates browser debugging and performance inspection using DevTools capabilities for advanced UI diagnostics.

name: Desktop Commander
summary: Runs desktop-level command and file workflows.
longDescription: Combines command execution and file operations to orchestrate local development tasks with assistant control.

name: Task Master AI
summary: AI-assisted task orchestration for software projects.
longDescription: Tracks project tasks, dependencies, and execution signals to improve planning and engineering throughput.

name: Claude Task Master
summary: Task planning and orchestration patterns for Claude workflows.
longDescription: Adds workflow templates for backlog shaping, sequencing, and completion tracking in assistant-led engineering work.

name: 21st Dev Magic
summary: Generates polished UI components from prompts and references.
longDescription: Turns UI intent, prompts, and screenshots into component drafts tailored for modern product teams.

name: Shadcn UI
summary: Builds and extends shadcn/ui based component systems.
longDescription: Accelerates implementation of consistent component libraries and design-token aligned frontend modules.
